name: Bitsy3D
description:
Convert any Bitsy game to a 3D adventure!

This project is a prototype with very limited support. Please consider supporting the project if you'd like to see more Bitsy features added! :)

---

Instructions:

  1. Create a game on Bitsy.
  2. In Bitsy's "game data" menu, click "download data".
  3. Start Bitsy3D (this project).
  4. Drop the Bitsy game data file into the Bitsy3D game window.
  5. Enjoy!

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Enter to progress through dialogs
  • Number keys (1, 2, 3...) to switch views
